Please notice that if you change this part, the basic functions for the reCamera could be damaged or missing.

name: function 3
Preview Page

Get Current Model
Preview Demo
info:
This is the demo for reCamera Gimbal.

We created a dashboard for gimbal for users 
to get a idea of how you can use nodes to 
control the gimbal. Feel free to modify
the flow at your wish.

Just be mindful that the device does have
some CPU limitation.

Printing out multiple debugs or using multiple
CAN nodes will result in a high CPU and cause
the crash of the device.

name: get_target_box

return msg;

name: disable_auto_tracking
Model Settings
info:
This are the Confidence and IoU settings
sliders of the computer vision model.

name: Auto tracking with Detection
info:
This part is in charge of the auto tracking
with the detection.

Using the output box width and height to get
the center of the detection object, then
ask gimbal to move accordingly.

name: Manual Control
info:
This part demonstrates an example of using
slider widget to control the gimbal.

Please noted once manually control the gimbal,
the auto tracking will stop.

name: Short cut move
info:
This part demonstrates an example of using
buttons to control the gimbal movement.

Standby means the angle position is
(180,90) to locate in the middle.

Please noted once manually control the gimbal,
the auto tracking will stop.

name: Can delete if no needs
info:
This is the basic webs of reCamera gimbal
such as Wi-Fi, ssh, or terminal.

You can delete this two subflows if you 
do not need them to show in the dashboard.

name: set_pitch_angle
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.pitch_angle
return msg;

name: set_yaw_angle
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.yaw_angle
return msg;
